message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.CR

This paper deals with natural language processing (NLP) algorithms for detecting unreliable news articles. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which deals with NLP and related topics. The paper also involves machine learning techniques for classification, which falls under cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). The use of attention mechanisms for encoding and classifying news articles suggests that the paper could also be classified under cs.IR (Information Retrieval). Finally, since the paper deals with the problem of unreliable news, it could also be classified under cs.CR (Cryptography and Security).
